case-study.title: Harmony Festival Documentary
case-study.subtitle: Capturing the Spirit of Music and Community
case-study.overview: The Harmony Music Festival needed a documentary that would capture the essence of their three-day event and drive ticket sales for future years.

section.heading: The Challenge
section.paragraph: The Harmony Music Festival had been growing steadily over its five-year history, but organizers felt they were missing an opportunity to showcase the unique atmosphere and experience to potential attendees. They approached us with several specific challenges:

list.item: Capturing the diverse musical performances across five stages and three days
Highlighting the community aspect that sets Harmony apart from other music festivals
Documenting the sustainable practices implemented throughout the event
Creating content that would drive ticket sales for the following year's festival

section.heading: Our Approach
section.paragraph: We developed a comprehensive documentary approach that would capture both the planned and spontaneous moments that make Harmony special. Our strategy included:

list.item: A six-person crew working in shifts to cover all festival hours across all stages
Dedicated interview stations to capture attendee and artist experiences
Drone coverage at golden hour each day to showcase the festival grounds
Behind-the-scenes access to document the sustainable operations
Embedded crew members with festival-goers to capture authentic experiences

section.heading: The Production
section.paragraph: Our team arrived two days before the festival to document the setup process and stayed one day after to capture the teardown, ensuring we told the complete story. During the festival itself, we collected over 120 hours of footage, including:

list.item: Performance footage from 32 musical acts across all stages
Interviews with 28 artists and 45 attendees
Aerial footage showcasing the festival grounds at different times of day
Time-lapse sequences of stage construction and crowd movements
Intimate moments between artists backstage and fans enjoying the music

section.heading: The Result
section.paragraph: We produced a 35-minute documentary that captured the spirit and energy of the Harmony Festival. The film was structured around the three-day journey, but woven with thematic elements that highlighted the community, sustainability, and musical diversity that define the festival.
The documentary was distributed through multiple channels:

list.item: Premiered at a special screening event for past attendees and music industry professionals
Featured on the festival website and social media channels
Segmented into shorter clips for targeted social media campaigns
Submitted to music documentary festivals, where it won two awards

section.heading: The Impact
section.paragraph: The documentary proved to be a powerful marketing tool for the Harmony Festival:

list.item: Early-bird tickets for the following year sold out 45% faster than the previous year
Social media engagement increased by 78% in the months following the release
The festival attracted five new major sponsors who cited the documentary as showcasing the values they wanted to associate with
Applications from artists wanting to perform increased by 60%
